mapper.select:
select seq_id, priv_name from
p where 1=1
and p.organization = #{_parameter}
order by priv_name

select SEQ_ID, PRIV_NAME from
p where 1=1
and (organization = #{_parameter} or organization = '' or organization is null)
order by priv_name
select count(1) from SYS_PERSON p where 1=1 and user_priv = #{_parameter}
select user_priv_other from SYS_PERSON p where 1=1 and user_priv is not null

select count(1) from
p where 1=1 and organization = #{_parameter}
select seq_id from SYS_PRIV where 1=1 and (organization = '' or organization is null or organization = #{organization} ) and priv_name = #{privName}
